Description.Text: Stop at Villa Zest Boutique Hotel to discover the wonders of Cape Town. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Villa Zest Boutique Hotel. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer internet access â€“ wireless, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, desk, iPod docking station to ensure a restful night. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include outdoor pool, massage, garden. Villa Zest Boutique Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Cape Town or to simply relax and rejuvenate.
